name: flexsia/barcode
description: Package to generate svg barcodes of different types. This package was planned to use in document creation and adds a extension for twig to make inline svg graphics generation easy. When you plan to use the render extension you need to make sure to install flexsia/render too. Since it should be possible to use it standalone for svg graphics generation we made the package optional and only suggest it.

suggest.flexsia/render: Required to use the barcode twig extension
